item.title: The First Love Letter to Lorrie
item.description: Dear Lorrie, "Just another boring night, nothing special will happen." I said to myself. I looked up at the sky, couldnâ€™t see any stars. I clicked the confirm button and sent my request to you. Then everything started to change. As the wind blew, I saw something bright was hidden behind the clouds. It shines a shaft of light on me. I was there, standing still, staring at it. People nearby walked in and walked out, no one noticed it.
